activities: Quill Lincolnshire, Inc. provides certain information technology and support services for affiliated companies established in the European Union and Switzerland.  In connection with those services, Quill may access and otherwise process in the United States individually identifiable information about the consumers and other end users of its European Customers. Quill acts solely as a data processor/agent for these purposes.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: Quill Lincolnshire, Inc. agrees to cooperate with the EU data protection authorities and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner with respect to customer data.
